hunterseekerrobotproject

Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • hunterseekerrobotproject.Robot
      • hunterseekerrobotproject.Target

  • public class Target
extends Robot
    This class adds Target related fields and methods to the Robot class, enabling the target to attempt to evade the Hunter, to provide the hunter with noisy measurements of its position, and to provide the simulation with true measurements of its position to evaluate the Hunter's performance.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class hunterseekerrobotproject.Robot

        maxdistance

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Target(java.lang.String newname, double setxpos, double setypos, double setheading, double setturn, double setdistance, double setMeasureNoise)
      Constructs a Target as a Robot with a fixed turn and movement distance used by the evade method to run the Target in circles, and a measurement noise variable used to simulate sensor noise in position measurements delivered to the Hunter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void evade()
      Moves the target to evade the hunter, in this case implements an ineffective evasion technique, running in circles.
      double getMeasurementNoise()
      Returns the variance of the measurement noise for use in the Extended Kalman Filter's model of the Target.
      double[] getTruePos()
      Returns the true position of the Target in an array for capture evaluation
      double[] measurePos()
      Simulates sensor based measurements of the the position of the Target by adding random gaussian noise to the true position of the target.

      • Methods inherited from class hunterseekerrobotproject.Robot

        getHeading, getName, getXpos, getYpos, move, printPos, setMaximumMotions

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Target

        public Target(java.lang.String newname,
              double setxpos,
              double setypos,
              double setheading,
              double setturn,
              double setdistance,
              double setMeasureNoise)
        Constructs a Target as a Robot with a fixed turn and movement distance used by the evade method to run the Target in circles, and a measurement noise variable used to simulate sensor noise in position measurements delivered to the Hunter.
        Parameters:
        newname - The name of the Target
        setxpos - The initial x position of the Target
        setypos - The initial y position of the Target
        setheading - The initial heading of the Target
        setturn - The amount by which the target turns on each move step in Radians
        setdistance - The distance the Target moves on each move step in unitless dimensions
        setMeasureNoise - The variance of the gaussian noise added to position measurements

    • Method Detail

      • evade

        public void evade()
        Moves the target to evade the hunter, in this case implements an ineffective evasion technique, running in circles.

      • measurePos

        public double[] measurePos()
        Simulates sensor based measurements of the the position of the Target by adding random gaussian noise to the true position of the target.
        Returns:
        an array containing the noisy measurements of the x-y position of the Target

      • getTruePos

        public double[] getTruePos()
        Returns the true position of the Target in an array for capture evaluation
        Returns:
        array containing the true x-y position of the Target

      • getMeasurementNoise

        public double getMeasurementNoise()
        Returns the variance of the measurement noise for use in the Extended Kalman Filter's model of the Target.
        Returns:
